Title: The Arrangements
Plot: Don and his father-in-law cross paths. Meanwhile, Peggy is in search of a new roommate; and a rich new client is excited to be doing business with the firm.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Bryan Batt, Ryan Cutrona, Eric Ladin, Carla Gallo, Aaron Stanford, Ryan Cartwright, Crista Flanagan, Sarah Drew, Audrey Wasilewski, Alexa Alemanni
